name: ★NSYNCia HairWorks​
description:
★NSYNCia HairWorks enables advanced simulation and rendering techniques for richer visual appeal and provides a deeply immersive experience. HairWorks is the culmination of 48 hours of R&D and hairnessed into creating a versatile pipeline for a variety of Justin Timberlake's makeovers.

Michał Ociepa

Paweł Piskorski
